403.title: Access Denied
403.subtitle: You don't have permission to access this resource
403.description: If you believe this is an error, please contact your administrator or try signing in with a different account.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.subtitle: The page you're looking for doesn't exist
404.description: The page may have been moved or deleted.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

500.title: Server Error
500.subtitle: Something went wrong on our end
500.description: We're working to fix the issue. Please try again later.
